recipe.title: Tomato Toast with Peaches, Mozzarella, and Mint
ingredients: 6 thick slices brioche or pain de mie, toasted
2 very ripe heirloom tomatoes, sliced 1/4" thick
instructions: Spread each toast evenly with butter and layer mozzarella, tomatoes, and peaches on top. Top with mint, drizzle with oil, and season with sea salt.
